abstract: Time Warner Cable or Comcast could theoretically pay more for Cablevision than the latest offer from its controlling family, but Cablevision’s governance structure means that investors may never see that optimal payday, Breakingviews writes.
lead_paragraph: Time Warner Cable or Comcast could theoretically pay more for Cablevision than the latest offer from its controlling family, but Cablevision’s governance structure means that investors may never see that optimal payday, Breakingviews writes.
